title: Vans Women's Doheny Platform Sneaker
descriptions:
Vans Women’s Doheny Platform Sneaker

Stand taller in a classic. Inspired by Vans legends the Era and the Authentic, the Doheny Platform elevates timeless skate DNA with a modern lift—without sacrificing comfort or durability.

Why you’ll love it:
- Elevated style: Platform sole adds height and a fresh, fashion-forward profile.
- Built to last: Double-stitched uppers deliver enhanced durability for everyday wear.
- Iconic grip: Signature rubber waffle outsole provides trusted traction and board feel.
- Classic construction: Vulcanized build offers flexible movement and that broken-in comfort you love.
- All-day comfort: Designed with increased comfort for daily adventures, from city walks to casual hangouts.

Pair it with jeans, skirts, or your favorite athleisure—this versatile platform sneaker brings heritage style and confident lift to any look.
